description: A property of a workflow specification shall be defined as a workflow specification property. A workflow specification property may contain nested workflow specification property(s).
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The work directive defined in part by this workflow specification.

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

contents.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value
